name: Black Bean Tacos
author: Courtney LeClaire
summary: Tangy black bean and salsa verde tacos take only minutes to make and are flavorful and delicious! Great vegetarian dish! Great by itself, but also wonderful with tomatoes, avocado, cheese, etc. Add any of your favorite taco toppings! Could also be served as a side dish with another meal.
ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) can black beans, rinsed and drained
directions: Heat olive oil in a saucepan over medium-low heat; cook onion in hot oil until tender, about 5 minutes
Stir black beans, green salsa, garlic powder, chili powder, and cumin with the onion
Reduce heat to low and cook the mixture at a simmer until it thickens, 5 to 10 minutes
Serve with taco shells, Mexican cheese blend, tomato, avocado, and shredded lettuce
